snippet: Mr. Frankfurt steered commercials away from the talking-head format and helped transform them into sophisticated, art-designed productions.
abstract: Stephen Frankfurt, advertising executive who steered television commercials from straightforward sales pitches to sophisticated, art-designed productions, dies at age 80.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Frankfurt steered commercials away from the talking-head format and helped transform them into sophisticated, art-designed productions.
